meanings.sent1: The skilled workers were considered employables by the company.
meanings.sent2: She completed the training program and became one of the employables in the job market.
meanings.sent3: The employables were so in demand that companies were competing to hire them.
meanings.sent4: Her determination made her stand out as an employable candidate for the position.
meanings.sent5: The employables showcased their talents at the job fair, impressing potential employers.

meanings.definition: People who are able to be employed.
meanings.sent1: The company was looking to hire more employables to expand their workforce.
meanings.sent2: The employables gathered in the conference room for the orientation session.
meanings.sent3: The employables shared funny stories from their previous jobs during the break.
meanings.sent4: She saw herself as part of a group of employables ready to take on new challenges.
meanings.sent5: The employables formed a strong community, supporting each other in their job search.
